Text: No. MKV is better. Get a player that supports it.
The english audio is NOT included. Fucking waste of time. Thanks, asshole.
There IS english DTS audio, russian is default but english IS included as secondary track. Dont be afraid of the filename either :) its legit.

Ahh shit, your right, Iippola. I was pissed because if you play it in VLC, there is one language- English. But it plays the Russian over the English. Tried it in Quick time, and there the two languages both are... I take it back, GoodFilms, I take it back! *Bows*
I absolutely LOVE this Film, has a real noir feel to it, proper throw back to the 40s with a mature bugsy malone spin on it :) A must!
